minetogether:screen.friends.title: MineTogether 好友
minetogether:screen.settings.title: MineTogether 設定
minetogether:linkaccount1: 將你的 Minecraft 帳號與 MineTogether 帳號連結。
minetogether:linkaccount2:
連結你的帳號，將會解鎖像是為你自己命名暱稱的能力。

即將開啟網頁瀏覽器，幫助你安全地登入帳號。
minetogether:new_user.2: MineTogether 是一款多人遊玩體驗增強模組，
minetogether:new_user.3: 提供像是聊天室、朋友清單以及伺服器清單等功能。
minetogether:new_user.4: 快來加入擁有 %s 名玩家的聊天室。
minetogether:screen.banned.line1: 你已被 MineTogether 聊天室封鎖。
minetogether:screen.banned.line2: 你希望透過 MineTogether 網頁提出上訴嗎？
minetogether:screen.servertype.title: 伺服器類型
minetogether:screen.servertype.listing.p: Public Servers don't have any limitations on entry. Anyone can join and immediately start playing, and their player bases can be large, but their open nature can increases the chance of being griefed.
minetogether:screen.servertype.listing.c: Community Servers are still relatively open, but will require being added to an approved list of members to join, offering some increased security and peace of mind with vetted users.
Closed Servers require a direct invite from the server owner to join. Usually for groups of friends, these servers may be smaller in population, but with the highest level of trust between users.
minetogether.screen.generalinfo.secure.l: All data is transmitted via SSL, no payment details
will be taken in the client. You will be redirected outside
of the client to CreeperHost's secure portal to make payment
minetogether.screen.generalinfo.pregen: 同意 Mojang EULA 並重新產生世界？

minetogether.order.ordermodpack: 你的伺服器將設為最新的模組包版本！
minetogether.order.info1: To continue to place an order, please click the Place order button below.
minetogether.order.info2: By continuing, you agree to CreeperHost's (Terms Of Service|https://creeper.host/tos) and (Policies|https://creeper.host/policies).
minetogether.order.info3: An order and invoice will be generated, but you are under no obligation to pay.
minetogether.order.info4: They will be automatically cancelled after 72 hours if no payment is received.

minetogether.multiplayerscreen.clickhere: 點擊此處，透過 CreeperHost 代理服務獲取一個伺服器！
